description: The various Stube-style dining rooms in the Oberwirt hotel restaurant have a typical Tyrolean ambience, while the cuisine is decidedly traditional with its focus on seasonal and regional ingredients, although a few fish options also always feature on the menu. Wine-enthusiasts will be delighted with the excellent wine selection.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
